gold_standard_examples.purpose: Calibration and training examples for annotators
gold_standard_examples.notes: Examples are split into two part files to comply with the repo 500-line/file rule.

usage_instructions.calibration: Use examples 1-10 for initial training. Have annotators annotate these without seeing answers first, then compare.
usage_instructions.edge_cases: Examples 10, 15-17, 19 are edge cases (instinctive, negation patterns, intention). Review these carefully.
usage_instructions.iaa_testing: Use examples 11-20 for IAA testing after initial calibration.
